title: Filler migration myths
summary: Migration can happen, but not every puffiness is migration.
body: Swelling, placement, and product choice all affect how filler looks over time. The right question is why it looks that way.

title: Overfilling consequences
summary: Too much filler can change facial movement and proportions.
body: Overfilling is often gradual. Small additions over time can add up to a look that feels off.

title: Dissolving realities
summary: Dissolving is a tool, but it is not a reset button.
body: It may take multiple sessions and should be handled conservatively. A careful plan matters.
